name: CGShading
desc: A definition for a smooth transition between colors, controlled by a custom function you provide, for drawing radial and axial gradient fills.

items.name: init?(axialSpace: CGColorSpace, start: CGPoint, end: CGPoint, function: CGFunction, extendStart: Bool, extendEnd: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a shading object to use for axial shading.

items.name: init?(radialSpace: CGColorSpace, start: CGPoint, startRadius: CGFloat, end: CGPoint, endRadius: CGFloat, function: CGFunction, extendStart: Bool, extendEnd: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a shading object to use for radial shading.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the Core Foundation type identifier for Core Graphics shading objects.
